00037 /// analyzes a rectangular region of m/z-time space 
00038 class PWIZ_API_DECL RegionAnalyzer : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00043     {
00044         std::pair<double,double> mzRange;
00045         std::pair<size_t,size_t> indexRange;
00046         std::pair<int,int> scanNumberRange;
00047         std::pair<double,double> rtRange;
00048         bool dumpRegionData;
00049         std::string filenameSuffix;
00050 
00051         Config();
00052     };
00053 
00054     RegionAnalyzer(const Config& config, const MSDataCache& cache);
00055 
00056     struct PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumStats
00057     {
00058         double sumIntensity;
00059         MZIntensityPair max;  // sample point with highest intensity
00060         MZIntensityPair peak; // interpolated peak
00061 
00062         SpectrumStats();
00063     };
00064 
00065     const std::vector<SpectrumStats>& spectrumStats() const;
00066 
00067     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Stats
00068     {
00069         size_t nonzeroCount; // # spectra with sumIntensity > 0
00070         double sum_sumIntensity;
00071         double sum_peak_intensity;
00072 
00073         // intensity-weighted peak statistics
00074         double mean_peak_mz;
00075         double variance_peak_mz;
00076         double sd_peak_mz; // standard deviation
00077 
00078         // index of peak with highest intensity
00079         size_t indexApex;
00080 
00081         Stats();
00082     };
00083 
00084     const Stats& stats() const;
00085 
00086 
00087     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00088     //@{
00089     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00090 
00091     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00092                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00093 
00094     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00095                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00096 
00097     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00098     //@}
00099 
00100     private:
00101     struct Impl;
00102     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00103     RegionAnalyzer(RegionAnalyzer&);
00104     RegionAnalyzer& operator=(RegionAnalyzer&);
00105 };
